column5: As you all know, this little piece of the internet is free for us all to use... well, it isn't exactly free, there are members here who do have bills to pay, to keep this place up and running. With Xmas right around the corner, everyone could use a few more ducats in their wallet... so may I suggest that everyone take a moment today or in the next few, to click on an ad/banner! HH

Thank you for the kind thought Joe but may I suggest we only click on a banner if the product or service is of use to us. Banner clicks don't really help anyone and serves to falsely inflate advertising stats.  Thanks though....was a good thought.
I just clicked, the fishing report.com. Excellent site, i saved to my bookmarks
I usually click on those banners that seem to have hot women that always seem to want to talk to me  Maybe cuz I R a arteest
Are you waiting for the brunette with the nice smile and the plunging neck-line too?
The last time i (accidently) clicked on a banner I almost got a virus..Wont do that again..
So you actually got to meet her?
I feel a Monalisa coming on ......... LOL .
Awww Man!!!.....She said I was special!!
